sense.def:
To invest an amount of money
pomeni položiti denar na banko ali z njim kupiti delnice, da bi dobivali dobiček.

seg.quote: £20 million of public money had been invested.
The investor is entitled to a reasonable return on his money.

sense.def:
To invest money, time, or energy in something
pomeni uporabiti denar, čas ali energijo, da bi poskusili nekaj narediti uspešno;

seg.quote: They are willing to invest energy in a European disarmament campaign.
They have failed to invest in job creation in the cities.

sense.def:
To invest in something useful
pomeni kupiti nekaj koristnega, ker bo po določenem obdobju cenejše ali učinkovitejše kot nekaj drugega.

seg.quote: Good shoes are worth investing in even though they are expensive.

sense.def:
To invest someone with rights or responsibilities
pomeni zakonito ali uradno nekomu dati pravice ali odgovornost;

seg.quote: The law invests the shareholders alone with legal rights.
